conversation.text: For someone who enjoys stories about real-life individuals achieving artistic feats, I recommend 'Man on Wire' (2008). It tells the captivating story of Philippe Petit, a tightrope walker, who illegally performed a high-wire routine between the World Trade Center's twin towers in 1974. The film features an impressive cast including Jean-Louis Blondeau as Petit himself.
